title: Organizations Schema
description: A schema to add regenerative economy organizations to the Murmurations Index

name.title: Organization Name
name.description: The complete name of the organization

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the organization (e.g., my-org.org or some-host.net/my-org)

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the organization

mission.title: Mission/Purpose
mission.description: A short statement of why the organization exists and its goals

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the organization

email.title: Contact Email
email.description: An email address at which to contact the organization

image.title: Image/Logo
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://), preferably a square

tags.title: Org Type - freeform tags
tags.description: Keywords that describe the organization, searchable in the Murmurations index

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.description: A list of relationships between this organization (subject) and various other entities (objects)

predicate.title: Predicate
predicate.description: The predicate of the relationship (e.g. 'is a member of ___', 'has a selection of ___', 'knows ___ for 10 years', 'trust ___ to hold a copy of my keys', etc.)

object_url.title: Object URL
object_url.description: The URL (ideally the Primary URL) of the object of this relationship (must start with http:// or https://, e.g., https://alice.net)

schema.name: organizations_schema-v1.0.0
schema.purpose: To map organizations within the regenerative economy
